name: ISO-lation
description:
Explore the wasteland 500 years after you were shut down
Fight off rogue robots and upgrade yourself with fuel cells
Don't wonder too far from the recharging station otherwise you'll shut down

Controls:

- W A S D to move

- Aim with your mouse to shoot

- Scroll wheel to change item

- Press 'E' when in the Charge station to access upgrade menu

- Press 'M' to access your map
